definition: move away from a place into another direction
details:
verb
- move away from a place into another direction
= synonyms: go
- go away or leave
= synonyms: absent
- leave
= synonyms: start
- wander from a direct or straight course
= synonyms: sidetrack
- remove oneself from an association with or participation in
= synonyms: leave
- be at variance with
= synonyms: deviate
